homePageAboutUsSection01: We are commited to providing our management teams with strategic "bigger picture" guidance. We take the strong foundation built by the former managers to the next level. Providing job safety and personal growth opportunities for our employees is a No. 1 priority for us.
homePageAboutUsSection02: It is our stated mission to build a meritocratic company culture, focused on performance born by love for the company. We wish to build small families in our companies, where all employees feel welcomed and wanted. This is the essence of Mittelstand.
homePageAboutUsSection03: Our constant focus on asymmetrical risk / reward ratios and return on time and invested capital has provided us with the checks and balances required to navigate stormy waters.
homePageBottomBar1: We are commited to providing our management teams with strategic "bigger picture" guidance.
ourApproachPhilosophyText: Value investing, focused on achieving maximal value add in our subsidiaries.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle1Text1: Your children arenʼt interested in following in your footsteps.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle1Text2: Internal succession is more of a last resort than an optimal solution?
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle1Text3: Feel free to get in touch with us, together we can find the perfect solution to preserve your legacy and your employees.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle2Text1: Great visions usually require capital and expertise. If you wish to follow your entrepreneurial dreams and require capital, feel free to reach out.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle2Text2: Youʼre an employee or executive that wishes to take the reins, the current owner has indicated an interest in selling?
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle2Text3: Partner with us for a brighter future for your company.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle3Text1: We always seek to align our interests with that of our management teams, whether it be via bonus structures or management equity partnerships.
ourApproachPhilosophyTitle4Text1: Our portfolio companies benefit from our deep understanding of their needs. We assist our management teams with strategic planning and implementation of improvements.
contactUsWindowTextLine1: You are planning to sell your company, want to build a new company or do a management buy-in? Any questions regarding the SKG business branches? Feel free to contact us! We will reach out to you.
404PageText1: Donʼt worry though! You can always navigate back to the
404PageText2: homepage or use the search bar to find what youʼre looking for.
PrivacyPolicy-information: I. Information about the processing of your data in accordance with Art. 13 of the General Data Protection Regulation (DS-GVO)
PrivacyPolicy-responsible_person: 1. Responsible person and data protection officer
PrivacyPolicy-responsible_person_details: The person responsible for this website is Jan Steinmacher, Danziger Str. 6, info@skg-global.co. You can reach the data protection officer by e-mail at info@skg-global.co.
PrivacyPolicy-data_processed: 2. Data processed for the provision of the website and the creation of the log files

PrivacyPolicy-data_processed_details.a: a. What data is processed for what purpose?
PrivacyPolicy-data_processed_details.a_subtitle: Every time content on the website is accessed, data is temporarily stored that may allow identification. The following data is collected in this context:

data_collected.3: Host name of the accessing computer
data_collected.4: Website from which the website was accessed
data_collected.7: Message whether the access was successful
data_collected.9: Information about the browser type and version used

PrivacyPolicy-data_processed_details.purpose: The temporary storage of data is necessary for the course of a website visit to enable delivery of the website. Further storage in log files takes place in order to ensure the functionality of the website and the security of the information technology systems. Our legitimate interest in data processing also lies in these purposes.

PrivacyPolicy-legal_basis: b. On what legal basis are these data processed?
PrivacyPolicy-legal_basis_details: The data is processed on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 letter f DS-GVO.
PrivacyPolicy-storage_duration: c. How long will the data be stored?
PrivacyPolicy-storage_duration_details: The data is deleted as soon as it is no longer required to achieve the purpose for which it was collected. In the case of website provision, this is the case when the respective session has ended. The log files are kept for 24 hours directly and exclusively accessible to administrators. After that, they are only indirectly available via the reconstruction of backup tapes and are permanently deleted after four weeks.

PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.a_details: You can request information in accordance with Art. 15 DS-GVO about your personal data that we process.
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.b_details: You have a right to object on specific grounds (see under point II).
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.c_details: If the information concerning you is not (or no longer) accurate, you may request a rectification in accordance with Art. 16 DS-GVO. If your data is incomplete, you may request that it be completed.
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.d_details: You may request the erasure of your personal data in accordance with Art. 17 DS-GVO.
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.e: e. Right to restriction of processing
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.e_details: You have the right under Art. 18 DS-GVO to request restriction of the processing of your personal data.
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.f: f. Right to lodge a complaint
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.f_details: If you believe that the processing of your personal data violates data protection law, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority of your choice in accordance with Ar. 77(1) DS-GVO.
PrivacyPolicy-data_subject_rights_detail.conclusion: In the event that the requirements of Art. 20 (1) DS-GVO are met, you have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to third parties. The collection of data to provide the website and the storage of log files are absolutely necessary for the operation of the website. They are therefore not based on consent pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (a) DS-GVO or on a contract pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (b) DS-GVO, but are justified pursuant to Art. 6 (1) (f) DS-GVO. The requirements of Article 20 (1) of the GDPR are therefore not met.

PrivacyPolicy-right_of_objection: II. Right of objection according to Art. 21 para. 1 DS-GVO
PrivacyPolicy-right_of_objection_details: You have the right to object at any time, on grounds relating to your particular situation, to the processing of your personal data carried out on the basis of Article 6(1)(f) DS-GVO. The controller will then no longer process the personal data, unless it can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing which override the interests, rights and freedoms of the data subject, or for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims. The collection of data for the provision of the website and the storage of log files are absolutely necessary for the operation of the website.
CoockieBannerText: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content. By clicking "Accept all cookies", you agree to the storage of cookies on your device to analyze the use of the website, improve our services and show you relevant advertising.
